name: Forum Transference
description:
Don't hate it plz!

I made this for my final high school year art project. It didn't do too well, but my teacher liked it, and I liked making it. 

It's not exactly my first project, but it is my first completed project, and definitely my first uploaded project. 

There are so many things I would have changed, and though both technically and conceptually I spent a lot of time on it, it never came together the way I'd hoped. 

I suppose it more reflected the emotional journey I had experienced in high school, especially during that year (last year!) and I hope you can find some value in it.

Feel free to message me, I would love some feedback, it gets hard to criticize yourself! So I'd love to hear how a complete outsider views it I guess?

Again, it's my first completed project, it's worth a lot less than the sum of its parts... I might delete it eventually, I'm not sure...

Made in RenPy, thanks RenPy!
